history.proof: intros a b H. exists (a / b). rewrite Nat.mul_comm. sfirstorder use: Nat.add_0_l, Nat.mul_comm, Nat.mul_0_r, Nat.div_unique_exact, Nat.mul_0_l unfold: Init.Nat.div, divides.

exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : nat H : divides a b Unable to unify "?M1404 * ?M1402 / ?M1403 = ?M1404 * (?M1402 / ?M1403)" with "a = b * (a / b)".

In environment a, b : nat H : divides a b Unable to unify "(?M1410 mod ?M1411 = 0 -> exists c : nat, ?M1410 = ?M1411 * c) /\\ ((exists c : nat, ?M1410 = ?M1411 * c) -> ?M1410 mod ?M1411 = 0)" with "a = a / b * b".
In environment a, b : nat H : divides a b Unable to unify "divides a b" with "a = a / b * b".
In environment a, b : nat H : divides a b Unable to unify "divides a b" with "a = a / b * b".

original: intros a b H. exists (a / b). apply Nat.divide_div_mul_exact. - rewrite Nat.mul_comm. apply Nat.mod_divides. apply H. - apply H.
